title: Is AI Leaving Kids Behind?
subtitle: Analysing why prompt engineering is a Ponzi scheme and how AI widens the digital divide in education.
author: Dr Sam Illingworth
content_html:
Thank you , , , , , and many others for tuning in.

In this live, and I talk about the ways in which AI is potentially exasperating the digital divide in schools and universities.

We also discuss what we can do to teach critical thinking skills, and why it’s so important to involve linguists, ethicists, and other experts in the development of large language models, not just engineers. Oh yeah, and we compare prompt engineering to a Ponzi scheme.

Here’s the article I reference about using chatbots to help us listen better.

And here’s more information about how cheap, outsourced labour in Africa is shaping AI English.

I would really recommend subscribing to Yaro on AI and Tech Trends, he is doing important work in helping to diversify and democratise AI use and development.
